25 #include "utils.h"

27 #include <cmath>

30 #include <opencv2/core/core.hpp>
31 
32 bool prl::eq_d(const double v1, const double v2, const double delta)
33 {
34  return std::abs(v1 - v2) <= delta;
35 }
36 
37 double prl::compareImages(const cv::Mat& image1, const cv::Mat& image2)
38 {
39  cv::Mat image1Mat = image1.clone();
40  cv::Mat image2Mat = image2.clone();
41 
42  if (image1Mat.empty())
43  {
44  throw std::invalid_argument("Input image #1 is empty");
45  }
46 
47  if (image2Mat.empty())
48  {
49  throw std::invalid_argument("Input image #2 is empty");
50  }
51 
52  bool isImageSizesEqual = image1Mat.size == image2Mat.size;
53  bool isImageTypesEqual = image1Mat.type() == image2Mat.type();
54  bool isImageChannelsCountsEqual = image1Mat.channels() == image2Mat.channels();
55  if (!isImageSizesEqual ||
56  !isImageTypesEqual ||
57  !isImageChannelsCountsEqual)
58  {
59  return 0.0;
60  }
61 
62  cv::Mat comparisonResultImage = (image1Mat == image2Mat); // -V601
63  //comparisonResultImage *= 1.0f / 255.0f;
64  comparisonResultImage &= cv::Scalar_<uchar>(1, 1, 1, 1);
65 
66  cv::Scalar comparisonResultImageChannelsSum = cv::sum(comparisonResultImage);
67  comparisonResultImageChannelsSum /= static_cast<double>(image1Mat.total());
68 
69  double percent = 0.0;
70 
71  if (comparisonResultImage.channels() == 1)
72  {
73  percent = comparisonResultImageChannelsSum[0];
74  }
75  else
76  {
77  percent = 2.0f;
78 
79  for (int ch = 0; ch < comparisonResultImage.channels(); ++ch)
80  {
81  percent = std::min(comparisonResultImageChannelsSum[ch], percent);
82  }
83  }
84 
85  return percent;
86 }
